resources.string:
Set the difficulty of the game. 

In higher difficulty, you need to 

hit from a greater distance.
The game is to\nkick the ball
Good game my friend.\nLet everything fly to nine)
Score and earn points that\n can be viewed in the score history!
You can increase the difficulty \nand then you will shoot from a greater distance, \nand it will be harder to score!
